016package de.cuioss.uimodel.model.impl;
017
018import de.cuioss.uimodel.model.RangeCounter;
019import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
020import lombok.Getter;
021import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
022import lombok.ToString;
023
024/**
025 * Simple Implementation for {@link RangeCounter}
026 *
027 * @author Oliver Wolff
028 */
029@RequiredArgsConstructor
030@ToString
031@EqualsAndHashCode
032public class BaseRangeCounter implements RangeCounter {
033
034    private static final long serialVersionUID = -1535931081715308509L;
035
036    @Getter
037    private final Integer count;
038
039    @Getter
040    private final Integer totalCount;
041
042    /**
043     * Copy Constructor
044     *
045     * @param rangeCounter must not be null
046     */
047    public BaseRangeCounter(final RangeCounter rangeCounter) {
048        count = rangeCounter.getCount();
049        totalCount = rangeCounter.getTotalCount();
050    }
051
052    /** {@inheritDoc} */
053    @Override
054    public boolean isCountAvailable() {
055        return null != count;
056    }
057
058    /** {@inheritDoc} */
059    @Override
060    public boolean isTotalCountAvailable() {
061        return null != totalCount;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public boolean isSingleValueOnly() {
066        return !isEmpty() && !isComplete();
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public boolean isEmpty() {
071        return count == null && totalCount == null;
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public boolean isComplete() {
076        return count != null && totalCount != null;
077    }
078
079}
